DOC.brief_title: S-1 Radiotherapy Elderly Patients With Esophageal Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: Purpose : evaluate dose-limiting toxicity recommend dose S-1 future phase II study administer concurrently thoracic radiation elderly patient ( > 70 year old ) esophageal Cancer . Methods : S-1 administered day 1-14 29-42 following dosage : 60 , 70 , 80mg/m ( 2 ) /day . Thoracic radiation therapy administer 1.8Gy fraction five time weekly total dose 54 Gy .
